show.title: Example of use of <kwc-i18n>
show.descirption: This page is a demo using <kwc-i18n>. As you can see, it is easy to use

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.key: The message key, as you will call it in js (ex: "my.super.key")
parameters.var: If set, register the translation result into the variable

use-var.title: When and how to use var?
use-var.description: The component cannot be inside the placeholder attribute
use-var.label: Label of my field

more.title: More
more.description: Change the locale and reload, the translation will not change!
